Name: Vermeer

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Really good experience. Service is casual and perfect. The food was fabulous, directly from their farm. We did some extraordinary culinary discoveries. Thank you for everything!

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Vermeer a Dutch classic you must have visited onces. English Chef using a lot of veggies in his menu's. A set menu (choose number of courses). Of course using seasonal ingredients it's a refined kitchen with (luckily) not too much going on ‚Ä¶

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Food was great. Really innovative and different to what I would normally go for. The taster menu was a fab choice. Service was top quality and the entire team made my partners birthday really special. Would highly recommend.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Excellent service, the ambience is good, it is located in the city centre, a very good location close to the Amsterdam Central station. Food is average to be honest, especially the Dutch duck, which is the main course, and is a bit pricey.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: We had such an amazing experience here for our anniversary dinner. The welcome was super, we had Champagne in the lounge with plenty of nice, vegan, appetizers and orange and herbal infused water. Then on to our table where we were served a ‚Ä¶

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: A year ago 2020, we celebrated our first anniversary here with my husband. We loved the whole experience, food was excellent, innovative, everything well timed and balanced. I loved the service and attention to explain us and guide and ‚Ä¶

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Wonderful meal. Chef is a big personality and very involved. Loved it.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Went here for my mom's birthday. The staff was super friendly, gave my mime several top ups. Food was amazing, just be prepared to get more dished than the numbe rod courses you choose. We ordered the 6 course and had 12 in total haha üòÇ Can definitely recommend this place.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Truly amazing! The staff were very friendly, our sommelier was brilliant, very knowledgeable and good banter. Went for the eight courses and ended up with about 12, each one was innovative and perfectly executed.  The dining room was cosy but elegant and we had a good laugh with the table next to us!  Would definitely recommend!!

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: We had an enjoyable dinner at Restaurant Vermeer. All of the dishes were well done, but few were particularly memorable. The standouts were the brussel sprout (you only get one delicious charred morsel) and the tourte de gibier, which was rich and gamey.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: This place is a Google Maps 5* spot for sure - you have to give it that much. Within its league of fine dining restaurants though, while Vermeer blows me away with its friendly and hospitable service as well as regular servings of well ‚Ä¶

Review Text:

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Had a great evening and everybody is trying to make sure you have a good time. The sommelier was awesome. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Fantastic dishes, very vegetarian friendly, superb service and a cozy and warm atmosphere. A truly memorable place that you must visit in Amsterdam!

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Delicious food, excellent service with wine pairing. 6-course menu was a 4.5-hour experience . With th all options and a few supplements, the bill was over 2X the menu price.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Wonderful place to enjoy a delicious dinner! Having booked a Culinary Arrangement with included accommodation, we got to enjoy a really nice weekend, all within COVID-19 regulations. Overall the staff was welcoming and the food was delicious.

Name: Vermeer

Name: Vermeer

Name: Vermeer

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Excellent experience, everything was great!!!

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: We enjoyed an excellent four course menu -augnented with quite a number of amuses. Served impeccably by a brigade of professional yet relaxed waiters. Imaginative cooking and also great wine pairings, poured from magnum sized bottles, even for the Sauternes dessert wine. Overall an outstanding experience.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Last year my husband took me here for my birthday. My first Michelin Star Restaurant experience, and it was good! Unbelievable how chef Chris Naylor is able to put so much flavor in each and every dish, and service is outstanding. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Amazing quality food. Fine dining. Very affordable comparable class. Attention to detail good. Unique flavors. Unique experience !! What could be improved : the bread....either make it very soft or just discontinue it. I did not thing the ‚Ä¶

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Very attentive yet unintrusive Service from all members of staff. We had the 5 course tasting menu and a lovely bottle of Italian white wine. The food was delicious and with the amuse bouche & palat cleansers I managed to be full after the courses.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant. They went above and beyond to serve us the best they could and it was truly incredible. I have highly positive memories from this restaurant but something that stood out to me was that the butter they served with the bread was absolutely incredible.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: A true hidden gem for non locals. If you are in the area I give this establishment my highest recommendation. The chef is a genius. We did the tasting menu and every course was an epicurean delight! Can't say much more than that. A delightful surprise!

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Wonderful meal, impeccable service.  We had a four course meal, but they brought several bites in between - we were stuffed, and we got to try raw shrimp... Literally they were alive and fighting me inside of my mouth.  What an experience - highly recommended for a beautiful dinner in Amsterdam!

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: The six course menu with wine package was great. It was a truly great experience. The sommelier (Simon Veldman) had "contagious" enthusiasm, but some of the other staff seemed less interested.

Name: Vermeer

Name: Vermeer

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: The service was good but the food is terrible and very overpriced. Sometimes it's great to spend good money on good food - this is NOT the case here. We did not leave hungry, but did not enjoy our meal either. The meal took over 3 hours. Save your money and time and stay away.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: You get 1 star. Why? Because the lights were on but no-one was home. Literally. The door was open, I walked around the entire restaurant 3 times shouting hello, on a Friday night... And not a soul to be found. Came many miles. No signs nothing.

Name: Vermeer
Review Text: Had more refined Michelin starred dines in my time, but this was consistently just amazing. Sommelier knew his stuff and offered wines that paired particularly well.
